scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n versor -o build/versor.js -- src/versor.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/versor.js -c negate_iife=false -m -o build/versor.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/versor.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/versor.js build/versor.min.js
